TopicTitle: Top Gun AI - The Official Tournament Thread

Articles.Content:
Well, I have a plane that would love to meet all of you, but it doesn't have a stock cockpit.  

Yes, it's as formidable as it looks. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

> 1 hour ago, Triop said:

> 
> Wow, Blue, I like your MiG-21...Untill it shot me down ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif ":confused:")
> 
> 
> 
> *"Damn, this kid is good"*
> 

I tried the HNC (with added Vulcan cannon) against your MiG-15, once again the MiG completely avoided every single missile with ease. 

Eventually the HNC got on the MiG's tail while climbing vertically and shot off one of the wings. The El Quicko actually did better in the guns battle than the HNC despite being so much worse at missile fights, it's lower wing loading and better pitch authority than the HNC got it in firing position much quicker.

<iframe class="imgur-album" frameborder="0" height="550" src="//imgur.com/a/GU39L/embed?background=ffffff&text=1a1a1a&link=4e76c9" width="100%"></iframe>

The next few rounds were pretty much the same, with the HNC firing off a few Sidewinders, the MiG evading with ease, and a gun battle where the HNC ends up winning. One time the HNC actually bumped into the remains of the MiG.

<iframe class="imgur-album" frameborder="0" height="550" src="//imgur.com/a/dL2Kp/embed?background=ffffff&text=1a1a1a&link=4e76c9" width="100%"></iframe>

One time a lucky Aim-9 got through, but that was the only missile hit I've ever got on the MiG. I think if it got some missiles of it's own and maybe some more wing area to help boost maneuverability it'd be a very hard fighter to beat, the TWR and ability to evade missiles are incredible. I tried deactivating the HNC's Vulcan to see if it could get a missile kill on the MiG, but the MiG ran out of fuel before the HNC even got the chance to fire all it's Sidewinders.

![MwlMSwT.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/MwlMSwT.jpg)

Exciting stuff! I think I wont release the Sand Spider as I have another plane I have almost finished. Even better than that. Mwahahaha. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")
I'll PM people copies of the star flux if you request it, but otherwise no public release until completion.

One plane to rule them all...

I shall call it **Anduril.**

![MwUVHBV.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/MwUVHBV.jpg)

![YrEliGK.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/YrEliGK.jpg)

![mdWrhuf.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/mdWrhuf.jpg)

[http://www./download/06urq8ax4urxa51/Anduril_Mk1.craft](http://www./download/06urq8ax4urxa51/Anduril_Mk1.craft)

4x Aim 120 = 16

4x Chaff = 8

2x Flares = 6

1x GAU 8 30mm = 14

2x Ammo box = 8

Total = 52

When you can't stack wings, you just make a bigger plane. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D") It's a great missile platform, good at dodging missiles and an excellent dogfighter, (provided the AI doesn't do anything silly like fly in a straight line for no reason). Plus I always wanted a fighter fitted with a GAU.

those engines look like they're set too high, all that thing's gonna want to do is pitch down.

> 
> 6 minutes ago, ihtoit said:
> 
> 
> those engines look like they're set too high, all that thing's gonna want to do is pitch down.
> 

Nope. You can compensate by tilting the engines down 2 degrees or as much as needed to maintain a near zero angle of attack on the body. Besides, the wings are tilted 3 degrees up for proper lift characteristics.

**Different height settings needs different steer factors settings, we need rules about Fighting heights, 150/500 or fighting at 600/1500, steer factor needs to be tuned !**

Maybe we should start a new challenge thread, or at least make the rules clear....

[@Triop](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/145841-triop/)

Yet *more* fights against your MiG:

This was with the nearest thing I had to the MiG, an ultra-low part Hawker Hunter type-thing powered by a non-vectoring Panther. It has 4 sidewinders but they almost never even got close to the MiG. Most of the fight was fought with the twin M230s.

[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/0autr4guyoxbnbn/Hunter%20BD.craft?dl=0)

<iframe class="imgur-album" frameborder="0" height="550" src="//imgur.com/a/nE1bm/embed?background=ffffff&text=1a1a1a&link=4e76c9" width="100%"></iframe>

The first fight was so evenly matched that the MiG ran out of fuel and landed before either plane could damage the other.

The next few fights seemed to show the hunter having a slight advantage, although I'm not sure why since it has a lower TWR and comparable wing loading to the MiG, and lacks thrust vectoring. The most common result was that it managed to shoot the MiG's engine, forcing it to land.
